Pre-Game Insights: Lesotho will hope to achieve a giant-killing mission when they take on Morocco at Stade Adrar on Monday in an Africa Cup of Nations qualifying match.
Morocco maintained their status as Africa's current top-ranked team after comfortably defeating Gabon 4-1 at the Stade Adrar last Friday.
Others: This match will be the first-ever meeting between Lesotho and Morocco.
Lesotho, the lowest-ranked team to qualify directly for the AFCON qualifiers group stage, knew they faced a daunting task to reach the competition proper next year.
Morocco have already qualified for next year's AFCON as the host.
